refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The bitshift operators shift the bits to the left or to the right the number of bits given.
The priority of these operators is less binding that the arithmetic ones, but more binding that the comparisons.
Parentheses may be used as above to force particular groupings.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.para: where the arguments a and b may be further expressions.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para: See the entry for the << operator for an example.
